sentence.Network_en: The house only needs an occasional coat of paint to keep it shipshape.

sentence.Network_en: All well, I hope; all shipshape and seaworthy?'
sentence.Network_cn: 我希望一切进展顺利, 万事俱备,只等出航. ”

RelatedPhrase.word: Those books are shipshape on the shelf

list.key: Those books are shipshape on the shelf
list.exp: 书籍整齐地排列在书架上
list.abs: 书籍是学者的粮食。The Books are in orderly rows on shelves.书籍整齐地排列在书架上。Those books are shipshape on the shelf.书整齐有序地摆在书架上。The characters in this book are carefully realized.
The girl with shapely body gets the room shipshape ., 体态优美的女孩把房间收拾得井井有条.

entry.tran: 整齐的;整洁的;井然有序的
entry.def: If something is shipshape, it looks tidy, neat, and in good condition.

example.ex: The house only needs an occasional coat of paint to keep it shipshape.
example.tran: 房子只需偶尔粉刷一次就可以保持整洁。

means.word_mean: 1. of places; characterized by order and neatness; free from disorder;

auth_sentence.content: Racks and shelves are impeccably neat, squared off, shipshape.
